com.google.wave.api.impl
Class GsonFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.google.wave.api.impl.GsonFactory

public class GsonFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory to instantiate a Gson instance, with pre-registered type adapters for serializing and deserializing Wave API classes that are used as data transfer objects.

create

public com.google.gson.Gson create()
Creates a Gson instance, with additional type adapters for these types:
  • EventMessageBundle
  • OperationRequest
  • Element

Returns:
an instance of Gson with pre-registered type adapters.

create

public com.google.gson.Gson create(java.lang.String opNamespace)
Creates a Gson instance, with additional type adapters for these types:
  • EventMessageBundle
  • OperationRequest
  • Element
  • JsonRpcResponse

Parameters:
opNamespace - prefix that should be prepended to the operation during serialization.
Returns:
an instance of Gson with pre-registered type adapters.
